originalText.text: My mom's aide is AMAZING!! However, this agency is horrific as far as communication.  As in, there is absolutely NONE!!!!!  Can't get through to coordinator, mailbox is always full, or she's not in or on another call or out to lunch or on a break.  Supervisors are just as useless!!!   They talk about their compassion but they have zero for their clients, aides, or the clients families.  Makes me sick!!!!

originalText.text: This place is very unprofessional . Not everyone is bad but the chief of director David  is very rude and unprofessional. They hang up on you mid conversation and If you want to be treated With respect as a employee do not work here. Just look at the reviews. It’s not all they make it seem .

They hang up on you mid conversation and If you want to be treated With respect as a employee do not work here. Just look at the reviews. It’s not all they make it seem .

originalText.text: Stay away from this agency. They do not pay their aides, scamming of falling short on timesheets. They never return your calls or emails on client side or aides.. They do not send a nurse monthly. They do not have an emergency continuity plan for aides or client in distress. They never follow up at all. This agency should be shut down as they do NOT qualify to serve client, aides or community. Any good reviews on this place is written in house or out of pocket clients.

originalText.text: terrible experience so far!!! my mother's aide is great and my mother truly enjoys her company. however the customer service in this agency is disgusting. when they answer the phone, if they answer. they don't provide a greeting or a name. I was not provided the aide's name before she arrived. I spoke to my mother's coordinator Scarlet  1 time and she was rushing me off the phone. did not even ask me how the services were going so far. I  was trying to update her on  incorrect information and also wanted to praise the aide.  my mother's case has been activate for a week . there is still not a plan of care in the home. I was forced to work remote because the aide feels lost she is new to homecare and there is no plan of care to direct the aide. I have called all week . trying to speak with my mother's coordinator left messages she does not return my calls. as  supervisor myself for another homecare agency I'm just disgusted .

originalText.text: I worked for this company back in 2004 and I see they are still bad with paying their staff. I used to cash my check back then and I remember them not accepting any checks from this company payroll as I was told the checks were “bouncing”. I quit after working with this agency after 1 year when my patient was put on hospice. Otherwise I would not advise using or working for this agency.
